General.Name: C-Media Electronics
General.Description: C-Media Electronics Inc. provides solutions for USB audio peripheral applications worldwide. The company offers USB2.0 full speed audio, USB2.0 high speed audio, PCI/PCIe audio, audio processor, and EOL products for use in headsets, microphones, speakers, sound stations, and sound cards. C-Media Electronics Inc. was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
